description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Beqa Lagoon, Fiji. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Five-Star Fiji Adults-Only Pool Bungalows on Exclusive Private Island
hotels.description: Enter a world of intimate, high-end opulence at the adults-only Royal Davui Island Resort, a 10-acre private island where laidback life meets celebrity-grade service. Hidden in the azure Beqa Lagoon of the South Pacific Ocean, the islandâ€™s powdery white-sand beaches, vibrant palm trees and pristine waters ooze secluded romance and Fijian indulgence. Think barefoot luxury, intimate dining experiences, ancient spa rituals, private plunge pools and a tropical marine reserve just waiting to be explored. With only 16 exquisitely appointed private bungalows and villas, Royal Davui Island Resort offers an exclusive, once-in-a-lifetime experience from the moment of arrival.

seo.title: Hotel a Beqa Lagoon - Fiji Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Beqa Lagoon, Fiji con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
